short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set watercolor background for every new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a fantastic browser extension that transforms every new tab into a canvas of beautiful watercolor backgrounds. Select from 10 vibrant dominant colors and experience a new, randomly generated watercolor background in your chosen color each time.

Key Features:

1) Color Switching: Easily switch backgrounds by clicking on the color block at the bottom of the page.

2) Lock/Unlock Backgrounds: Use the lock icon in the upper right corner to keep your current background fixed. When unlocked, a new background loads with each tab opening.

3) Instant Background Refresh: For an immediate background change in the current tab, click the rotation icon in the lower right corner.

Enhance your browsing experience with stunning watercolor backgrounds that bring color and joy to every new tab. In future updates, we will add more background styles and colors to further customize your experience.
